questions.question: Are there two female figures present in the image?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the edited image illustrates two female figures standing side by side. This can be determined by their distinct silhouetted bodies and attire, indicating two separate individuals.

questions.question: Are the two figures positioned symmetrically relative to the central axis of the image?
questions.explanation: Image B shows the two figures standing side by side along the pathway, creating a symmetrical appearance relative to the central vertical axis running down the middle of the image.

questions.question: Is there a large central dome visible at the end of the pathway?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the central emblematic dome is a prominent part of the architectural structure at the end of the pathway, visible due to its size and position within the composition.

questions.question: Is there an arched stone entrance framing the view of the central structure?
questions.explanation: The edited Image B demonstrates an arched frame around the scene, which resembles an architectural entrance, thereby framing the view of the main structure and the pathway.

questions.question: Is there a straight water channel running from the foreground to the central structure?
questions.explanation: In Image B, there appears to be no depiction of a water channel; instead, the foreground pathway leads directly towards the central structure without any indication of water.

questions.question: Do the sarees retain a dominant red and gold color scheme?
questions.explanation: The sarees in Image B exhibit prominent red and gold colors through their designs, which include floral patterns and borders echoing the original palette.

questions.question: Are gold jewelry pieces, including a forehead ornament (maang tikka) and earrings, visible on both figures?
questions.explanation: In Image B, there is no visibility of detailed gold jewelry such as a maang tikka or earrings that can be discerned, as the edited illustration shows stylized forms of jewelry without distinct features.

questions.question: Do both figures have long, dark hair?
questions.explanation: Image B shows both figures with long, dark hair, which can be seen flowing down their shoulders and back, consistent with traditional artistic depictions.
